name: styled-starter
description: Starter Kit with React, Next.js and Styled System to get projects up and running with a design theme, built-in styleguide and test suite configuration

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && npm run export
scripts.deploy: git push origin master && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && ENV_GH_PAGES=true next build && ENV_GH_PAGES=true next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages

author: John Polacek
